245984.「ひきかえせ！ ひきかえせ！ ひきかえせ！\n ひきかえせ！ ひきかえせ！ ひき:
Turn it over! Turn it over! Turn it over! Turn
it over! Turn it over! Turn it over! Turn it
over! Turn it over! Turn it over!

245986.「……こんな場所で 君に会うとはな。:
I never thought I'd see you in a place like
this.

245987.「魔瘴の巫女 イルーシャを返せ……か？: Return the demon maiden of miasma, Irusha...?

245988.「彼女は ファラザード城にいる。\n だが 私は 別の目的があって\n ここに来:
She is in Farazard Castle. But I came here for
another purpose.

245989.「すまないが 君と争う 時間も意思もない。\n 今は それよりも……。:
I'm sorry, but I don't have the time or the
will to fight you. Right now, I'm more
interested in...

245991.「おびえることはない。\n 悲鳴が聞こえたので 駆けつけたのだ。\n ケガは な:
Don't be frightened. I heard a scream and
rushed to the scene. Are you hurt?

245992.「……私は 敵ではない。 \n さあ こちらへ 来たまえ。: I am not the enemy. Come, come this way.

245993.「その子を連れて ついてきてくれ。 \n 安全な場所に 案内しよう。:
Bring him with you and follow me. I'll take
you to a safe place.

245994.「この像のまわりには 亡者が近寄らない。\n 少しは 落ち着いて 話せるだろう。:
The deceased will not come near this statue.
Maybe we can talk a little bit more calmly.

245995.「はっ はい……！\n 助けていただき ありがとうございました！\n 私 ランテ:
Yes...! Thank you for your help! My name is
Rantel.

245996.「ファラザードから ゲルヘナ幻野へ \n 薬草を探しに 出たのですが\n 砂漠に:
I went out from Farazard to Gerhena Field to
look for medicinal herbs, but I couldn't go
back to the desert...

245997.「帰り道を探して 歩いてるうちに\n すっかり 迷ってしまいました。\n あの…:
I got completely lost while walking around
looking for the way home. Um...where am I?

245998.「ここは 悲憤の灰が降る 呪われた地……。:
This is a cursed place where ashes of wrath
fall...

245999.「数百年前 この場所には 豊富な鉱脈資源で \n 栄華を誇った ネクロデアという:
Hundreds of years ago, there was a country
called Necrodea that thrived on the rich
mineral resources of this place.

246000.「だが あのバルディスタに 鉱脈資源と \n 高度な製鉄技術を狙われ 攻め滅ぼさ:
But Valdista, with his mineral resources and
advanced iron-making technology, invaded and
destroyed the city. After a brutal massacre.

246001.「他でもない…… \n これが ネクロデアを滅ぼした\n バルディスタの凶将 ゾ:
None other... this is General Zobris, the
deadly general of Valdista who destroyed
Necrodea.

246002.「で……でもっ 倒したんですよね？: So... but you beat him, right?

246003.「奴の身体に 突き刺さっているのが\n 魔剣アストロンだ。\n あれに貫かれてい:
The Magic Blade Astoron is the one that is
stuck in his body. While being pierced by it,
his whole body turns into a lump of iron.

246004.「……私が ここに来たのは\n 魔剣アストロンを 手に入れるためなのだ。:
...I came here to receive the Magic Blade
Astoron.

246005.「あの魔剣を 我が主に献上することで \n こたびの大戦の 勝機をつかめると……:
I am convinced that by presenting the sword to
my Lord, we will have a chance to win this
war.

246006.「だが こんな場所で ファラザードの子を\n 保護することになろうとはな……。:
But how could I have known that I would end up
protecting Farazard's child in a place like
this?

246007.「私は 君と 取り引きがしたい。\n もちろん 互いに 益のある話だ……。:
I'd like to do business with you. A mutually
beneficial one, of course...

246008.「もしも 君に その気があるならば \n あらためて 声をかけてもらえないだろう:
If you are so inclined, would you care to
speak to me again?

246009.「誓いを立てた あの日から ２００年……\n ようやく この時が来た。:
Two hundred years have passed since the day we
made our vows... and now the time has finally
come.

246010.「ゾブリス……。\n 今こそ 貴様を 完全に消滅させる。:
Zobris... now is the time to annihilate you
completely.

246012.「私のこと まだ気づかないなんて……\n 本当に素敵だわ ナジーン。あなたって\:
It's so nice of you not to notice me yet,
Nazine. You've grown up and you're still silly
and beautiful.

246013.「私は 魔界最強の幻術師にして\n バルディスタの将軍 ゾブリス。:
I am Zobris, the greatest illusionist in Demon
World and General Zobris of Valdista.

246014.「かわいいランテルは ただの幻影……。 \n 正体は 斬り落とされた 私の左手だ:
Cute Rantel was just an illusion... in
reality, it was my left hand that was cut off.
Uh-huh! I'm sorry I'm such a liar.

246015.「おぉ……うるわしのネクロデア！ \n 王も民も 皆 誇り高く 自信に満ちていた:
Oh... lewd Necrodea! King and people were all
proud and confident.

246016.「だから ねえ……？\n 侵略に抗う勇気を その誇りを……\n 徹底的に けがし:
So, you know... I'm sure you've had your pride
in your courage to resist the invasion
thoroughly eroded, haven't you?

246017.「だめだ……やめろ……だまされるな！\n 父上 母上……ああ……行くな…………ッ:
No... don't... don't be fooled! Father,
Mother... ah... don't go...

246018.「抵抗をやめれば 人質にとった\n ネクロデアの王子 ナジーンの命だけは\n 助:
If you stop resisting, I will spare the life
of Nazine, the prince of Necrodea, whom you
have taken hostage...oh well.

246019.「見えすいた嘘に はかない幻を見て \n あなたたちは 素直に信じて 従ったわ。:
You saw a fleeting illusion in a blatant lie,
and you believed and obeyed it honestly.
Without even knowing that I'm a liar.

246020.「誇り高きネクロデア王も 王妃も 国民も\n 隅から隅まで 踏みにじられて……ア:
The proud King of Necrodea, the Queen, and the people of Necrodea, trampled from head to toe... ah... Beautiful things shine only when
they're beautiful.

246021.「ほら 見て！ わかるでしょう？ \n 滅びたネクロデアの なんて美しいこと！\:
Look, look! Can't you see? How beautiful the
ruined Necrodea is! Woh... woh... woh...
woh... woh... woh... woh... woh... woh!

246022.「ゾブリス 貴様ッ！: Zobris, you son of a bitch!

246023.「最後に生き残った あなたから もらった右目\n 絶望に染まって とっても キレ:
You were the last one to survive, and you gave me your right eye, which was stained with despair and so beautiful. I wish I could Pet
Monster you forever.

246024.「だが そこに あの いまいましい \n 赤毛の小僧が現れて 私の手を 斬り落と:
But then that damn red-headed boy comes along,
slashes my hand off, and thrusts the Magic
Blade Astoron into my body. And...!

246025.「この左手だけで 逃げのびて……\n あなたが 魔剣を引き抜いてくれる日を\n:
I've been waiting for the day that you would
pull out the magic sword.

246026.「サァ……あの日の続きを しましょう？\n その誇りを グチャグチャに すりつぶ:
Let's continue where we left off that day, shall we? I'll grind up your pride into a pulp, and what's left of your left eye will be
mine, too.

246027.「ウフ！ そう あなた…… \n はじめて見たときから 気になっていたの。\n:
Ugh! Yes, you... have been on my mind since the first time I saw you. Your eyes are so straight, as if they can see through
illusions.

246028.「アァ……あなたのことも けがしたい。: Ah...I want to hurt you too.

246029.「私が作りだす 幻の中で \n 泣いて わめいて 踏みつけられて\n 誰よりも美:
In the illusion I create, weeping, ranting,
being trampled, I want you to scatter more
beautifully than anyone else!

246030.「そんな…………これで 終わり？\n いや……いや…………いやよッ！！: Oh, no... is that all? No... no... no!

246031.「まだ 誰も見たことのない……美しさを……\n もっと……もっと…………ああ……:
I want more... more... beauty... that no one
has seen yet... ahhh...

246032.「なぜ……戻ってきた ユシュカ！\n アストロンは 魔界を救うための剣……。:
Why did you... come back, Yushka! Astoron is
the sword that will save Demon World...

246033.「自国を滅ぼした 王子など\n 捨て置いてくれれば よかった。:
I wish I had left behind the prince who
destroyed my country.

246034.「すべてを失った 私に\n もはや 生きる価値などない…………。:
I have lost everything. I no longer have any
Value of Life...

246038.「ああ。そうだったな ユシュカ……。\n その言葉に救われて 私は 決めたんだ。:
Oh. Yes, Yushka... those words saved my life,
and I decided to go for it.

246039.「どこまでも お前と共に 生きていこう……。: I will live with you forever...

246040.「ついに 仇敵を 討ち果たすことができた。\n この地に留まる魂も 安らかに旅立:
At last we have vanquished our avenging enemy.
The souls that remain here can now depart in
peace. Thank you... for your presence.

246041.「魔剣アストロンは ユシュカのために \n ふたりで きたえあげた剣だった。\n:
Magic Blade Astoron was a sword that we both
made for Yushka. But for my sake, I made it
unusable...

246042.「こたびの戦争は 新興国ファラザードと\n ユシュカが直面した 未曽有の大戦。\:
This is a war of unprecedented scale between the newly emerging nations of Farazard and Yushka. Now is the time to harness the power
of the magic sword.

246043.「そして 君もだ…… <cs_pchero>殿。\n 敵対している関係で おかし:
And you too... . I know it's a strange thing to have an adversarial relationship, but I still think Yushka needs
you.

246044.「共に ファラザードへ 向かおう。\n すべては それからだ。:
Let's head for Farazard together. It all
starts then.

246045.「旧ネクロデア領の南 血潮の浜辺に\n 鉄のほこらと呼ばれる 建物がある。\n:
South of Old Necrodea Area, on Bloody Beach,
there is a building called the Iron Dustbin. I
want you to head there first.

246046.「あの日 ネクロデアの王子は 死んだ。\n 今の私は ただの ナジーン。\n フ:
The prince of Necrodea died that day. Now I am
just Nazene. I am Nazine of Farazard...

246047.「鉱物資源が豊富だった ネクロデアは \n ジャリムバハ砂漠の小国家群と\n 交:
Rich in mineral resources, Necrodea had many
opportunities to trade with the small states
of the Jyarimbaha Desert.

246048.「我々は さまざまな工夫を 凝らして\n 盗賊への対策を おこなった。\n これ:
We have tried to counter the thieves in
various creative ways. This is one of them.

246049.「この 隠し砂州を 利用することで\n 安全な交易路を 確保していたのだ。\n:
By using these hidden sandbars, they were able
to secure a safe trade route. It is said that
it was quite difficult to pioneer the area.

246050.「昔 ユシュカから 聞いたことがある。\n アストルティアの海は どこまでも青く:
Yushka once told me. I heard that the sea in
Astoltia is clear and blue.

246051.「交易船が行き交う 活気にあふれた海か。\n 一度 見てみたいものだ……。:
A vibrant sea where trading ships come and go.
I'd like to see it once...

246052.「……さて この砂州を東に向かうと\n ファラザードの下水道に 入れる。:
...Now, if you head east on this sandbar, you
can enter the sewers of Farazard.

246053.「下水道には ファラザード城の地下に\n つながっている 秘密のハシゴがあるのだ:
There is a secret ladder in the sewers that
leads to the basement of Farazard Castle. From
there we will enter the castle.

246054.「あなたの光が近づいてくるのを 感じていたわ。 \n 必ず 来てくれると思ってた:
I could feel your light coming. I knew you
would come...

246055.「フン……。遅すぎるくらいだな。\n だが どうやって 城の中に入った？:
Hmmm... it's a little too late for that. But
how did you get inside the castle?

246056.「ナジーン！ バルディスタと交戦中だぞ。\n 偵察にどれだけ 時間をかけて……\:
Nadine! We're in the middle of an engagement with Valdista. How much time did you spend scouting... you didn't think you could lead
this guy by the hand, did you?

246058.「そう……か。\n お前 ネクロデアに 行ってたのか……。: I see... You've been to Necrodea...

246059.「あの時の借りを 返すために。 \n ですが その前に 我が王よ……\n あなた:
To pay you back for what you did to me. But
first, my king I would like to say a few words
to you.

246060.「いつか あなたは 私に語ってくれました。 \n アストルティアの師から 学んだ:
One day you told me about the idea of
cooperation that you learned from your mentor
in Astoltia.

246061.「考え方が違えば 衝突することもある。\n それでも 他者と交わることで 生まれ:
We have different ways of thinking, and there are times when we clash. But the new value that is born when we interact with others is
irreplaceable...

246062.「それならば なぜ……\n <pc>殿とは 協調できないのですか？:
If that's the case, then why can't you... work
with <pc>?

246063.「結局 今のあなたは 私情に流され \n おのれの自尊心が 守られる範囲で\n:
In the end, you are merely choosing a
situation within the limits of your own self-
esteem, driven by your personal feelings.

246064.「だからって……もう一度 組めと言うのか？\n 俺のしもべじゃ なくなった こい:
But you want me to work with him again? With a
man who is no longer my servant?

246065.「魔王たちが一堂に集い 大審門が開かれ\n 新たな大魔王の 選定がおこなわれたの:
It is because of your meeting and cooperation that the Demon Kings gathered together, the Great Demon Gate was opened, and a new Great
Demon King was chosen...

246066.「ふたりの 選ぶ道が交わった その時\n 大きなチカラが 生まれるのです。\n:
When the paths they choose intersect, great
power will be born. A power so tremendous that
it could move the Demon World.

246067.「……チッ。昔っから 変わらないな。\n お前は いつも……正論ばかりだ。:
...Tsk. You haven't changed since the old
days. You're always... always right.

246069.「ファラザードの特攻隊長 シシカバブ様がぁ\n じきじぎに 伝令に来てやっだど！:
Farazard's suicide captain, Shish Kebab, has
come to send a message to Ajiki!

246071.「ジャリムバハ砂漠から バルディスタ軍が\n あわでて 引ぎ上げでいっだど！\n:
Valdista's army has just stormed out of
Jyarimbaha Desert! But I heard there's a war
going on somewhere else!

246072.「いや～っ！ はっはっはっ。\n うまくいきましたな ユシュカ王。\n あなた様:
No~! Ha ha ha. That went well, King Yushka.
I'm impressed with your skill!

246073.「いいタイミングで動いてくれて 助かったぞ。 \n 険悪だったゼクレスと 同盟を:
Thank you for moving at the right time. It was thanks to you that we were able to form an alliance with Zechres, who had been on edge,
Mister Ojalos.

246074.「ファラザードが バルディスタ軍の本隊を \n 砂漠に引きつけておき ガラ空きの:
Farazard will draw Valdista's main army into the desert, while my Zechres will attack the rattled mainland... a brilliant surprise
attack!

246075.「この大戦 不干渉を貫いていた ゼクレスが\n 介入してくるとは 予想できますま:
You can't expect Zechres to intervene after
his non-intervention in this war. Valdista's
home country must be in a panic!

246076.「俺たちが 魔瘴の巫女をさらったのは \n バルディスタを挑発して 攻めてこさせ:
Our kidnapping of the maiden of miasma was
just bait to provoke Valdista into attacking
us.

246077.「俺の計画通りに 戦況は動いた。\n これ以上 こいつを 束縛するつもりはない。:
The war has moved as I planned. I don't intend
to constrain him any longer. Do what you want
with the rest.

246078.「……無理に連れてきて 悪かったな。: ...I'm sorry I forced you to come with me.

246079.「バルディア山岳地帯で 戦端は開かれました。\n 今こそ ヴァレリアを討ち取る:
War has broken out in the Valdia Mountain
Region. Now is the perfect time to take on
Valeria. Let us go, Lord Yushka!

246080.「うおおおおっ！ ウデが鳴るろぉん！\n 戦場が オデを呼んでるどぉおおおん！！:
Whoo-hoo-hoo! Ude ga aruroon! The battlefield
is calling for I!

246081.「アストルティアへの 再侵攻をたくらむ\n ヴァレリアを討ち 魔瘴への対抗策を守:
I will defeat Valeria who plans to invade Astoltia again, and I will defend the countermeasures against demon miasma. I will
save the Demon World in my own way.

246082.「お前のチカラが 必要だ。\n 一緒に来い ナジーン！: We need your help. Come with me, Nazine!

246083.「まったく しかたのない人だ。\n お供しましょう……どこまでも。:
You're a total liability. I'll accompany
you...wherever you go.

246084.「ふたりとも 行ってしまった。\n でも なんだか 胸がざわついて……。:
They've both gone. But my heart is still in my
chest...

246085.「ええ……私は 大丈夫よ。\n ファラザードの人は みんな優しくて\n 怖い思い:
Yes...I'm fine. Everyone in Farazard is very
kind and I didn't feel scared.

246086.「ユシュカは…… \n あなたのことを 思いだしては\n いつも 苦しそうに 悩:
Yushka... was always in such pain and distress
when she thought of you.

246087.「どうして 大魔王に 選ばれたのが\n 自分ではなく あなただったのか…………。:
I don't understand why the Great Demon King
chose you and not me...

246088.「なんだか 嫌な予感がして たまらない。\n きっと あなたのチカラが 必要だわ:
I have a bad feeling about this. I'm sure I'll
need your help...

246089.「お願い <pc>……。\n バルディア山岳地帯へ 向かって\n ユシュカに 手:
Please <pc>... head to Valdia
Mountain Region and give Yushka a hand.

246090.「それが 魔界の未来に つながる。 \n そんな気が するの……。:
That will lead to the future of Demon World. I
have a feeling that...

246091.魔界の戦況に 変化が起きて\n砂の都ファラザードと ジャリムバハ砂漠の\nアビス:
It seems that the war situation in Demon World has changed and the Abyss Gates in the Sand City Farazard and Jyarimbaha Desert have been
opened.

246094.「くそっ……。ゼクレスと組んで なお \n バルディスタの兵力に 押されるとはな:
Damn... even after teaming up with Zechres,
Valdista's army is still outnumbered.

246095.「…………それでも やるしかありません。: Still, we have to do it.

246098.「俺が 直接 ヴァレリアを討つ。\n 援護しろ ナジーン！: I'll take Valeria myself. Cover me, Nazine!

246099.「ファラザードの魔王 ユシュカ！\n 覚悟ォオーーーーッ！！:
Demon King Yushka of Farazard! Prepare
yourself!!!!

246100.「君のおかげで ユシュカを守れる。\n 我々の背中を あずかってくれ。\n 後は:
Thanks to you, we can protect Yushka. You've
got our backs. We'll leave the rest to you...!

246102.「ヴァレリア！ ここで お前を倒し \n 俺は実力で 大魔王になってみせる！:
Valeria! I will defeat you here and become the
Great Demon King by sheer force!

246103.「知略と悪知恵を はき違えた \n 小僧ごときに 何ができるかッ！！\n 魔界を:
What can a boy with a slogan slapped on his
head do? Only power can rule Demon World!

246104.「雑草どもが 身のほど知らずな夢を\n わめいておるわ……。:
Weeds, ranting about their own selfish
dreams...

246105.「この魔界を統べるのは 我がゼクレスと\n 最初から 決まっているのに。:
It was decided from the beginning that My
Zechres would rule this Demon World.

246107.「このミアラの宝杖は ゼクレスが誇る秘宝……\n アスバルが生まれ持った 絶大な:
This treasured staff of Meara is the pride of Zechres, and Asbal's Staff will feed on the immense magical power Asbal was born with to
summon the demons of the ancient world!

246111.「魔界を 我がゼクレスの掌中に。\n お前の魔力で すべてを\n 焼きはらってお:
Demon World is in the hands of my Zechres. I
will burn it all down with your magical power!

246113.「あっ 姉上！ このままでは……\n アスバルの身体が もちませんぞ！？: Oh, sister! Asbal's body won't last!

246114.「フフ……。\n しばし 休ませれば また使えよう。:
Fufu... let it rest for a while and it will be
ready to use again.

246115.「この戦 ゼクレスの勝利は 決まったも同然。 \n もはや ファラザードも バル:
Zechres' victory in this battle was as good as
decided. Neither Farazard nor Valdista had the
strength to stand up.

246116.「生き残った者に 撤収命令を出せ。 \n あとは 捨て置け。:
Order the survivors to leave. Leave the rest
behind.

246120.「待ってろ。今……助けるから。\n こんなキズ すぐに 治してやる。\n だから:
Wait for me. I'll help you. I'll fix this
wound right away. So... so...

246121.「うろたえるな。ファラザードの魔王よ……。: Don't be dismayed. Demon King of Farazard...

246122.「あなたは…魔界を救うために……\n 夢を……為すべきことを 成さなければ……。:
You... must dream... do... what you must do...
to save Demon World.

246123.「その夢は……！\n お前とじゃなきゃ 果たせないんだ。\n お前が いなかった:
That dream...! I can't make it happen without
you. What's the point if you're not here?

246125.「灰にまみれた 旅立ちの日も…… \n ファラザードを興した 朝焼けの日も……\:
The day of your departure in the ashes, the
day of the sunrise that raised Farazard, you
told me stories.

246126.「今までの どんな魔王も……\n 成し得なかった方法で\n 理想郷を築き 魔界を:
I will build an ideal world and save Demon
World in a way no Demon King has ever done
before.

246127.「あなたが語る 破天荒な夢が…… \n とても……好きだった……。:
I loved it when you told me about your wildest
dreams...

246128.「だから…… どうか………… \n あなただけのやり方で…… 魔界を…………。:
So... please... do it your own way... in your
own Demon World...

246130.「私は あなたの副官…… \n あなたが 必要と……するなら……:
I am your second-in-command... if you need
me... to...

246131.「ユシュカ。いつまでも そばに…………: Yushka. I will always be with you...

246134.「バルディスタも ゼクレスも\n みんな 引ぎ上げていっだど……。\n オデたち:
Valdista, Zechres, and all the others were
pulled up... and the I's were pulled up by
Farazard.

246137.<cs_pchero>は ユシュカたちと共に\n戦場から 引き上げた……。:
<cs_pchero> pulled up from the battlefield
with Yushka and the others...

246139.「ユシュカは 自分の部屋に こもったままよ。\n 帰ってきてから ずっと……。: Yushka's room. Ever since she came home...

246140.「あなたの言葉なら 応えてくれるかもしれない。\n どうか 彼に 声をかけてあげ:
Maybe he will respond to your words. Please,
give him a voice.

246141.「ユシュカ……<pc>が 来てくれたわ。 \n みんな あなたのことを 心配して:
Yushka...<pc> is here. Everyone is
worried about you. Please, open the door.

246143.「うぉおおおお～～～い おいおいおい……\n オロロ～～～ン ウォンウォンウォ～:
Woah woah woah woah hey hey hey... Oloro~~~
wong wong wong!!

246144.「ユシュカあぁぁ……かわいそうだどぉ……！！\n オデだっで 大事な子分を なく:
Yushka ah... poor Yushka...! I'm a fool, and
I'm crying over my precious henchman

246145.「あのう……ごめんなさい～。\n お取込み中 失礼します！: Um...sorry~! Excuse me while I take this in!

246146.「魔仙卿さまから あなたに 緊急の伝言です！\n この 記憶の結晶を 再生します:
Oracle has an urgent message for you! I will
replay this Memory Crystal.

246147.「先の戦い……我も 神殿より見守っていた。 \n 数々の犠牲 あまりにも痛ましい:
I, too, watched the battle from the temple. The sacrifices made by those who died in that battle were too tragic, especially that of
Zechres.

246148.「ゼクレスの者が持つ ミアラの宝杖は \n かつて 魔界を 壊滅的な危機におとし:
The treasured staff of Meara, possessed by Zechres, once brought the Demon World to a catastrophic crisis. If left unchecked, it
will bring about further calamity.

246149.「どうか これより ゼクレス城へ向かい\n ミアラの宝杖を 破壊してもらえぬか？:
Will you please go to Zechres Castle and
destroy the treasure wand of Meara? This is
something only you can do.

246150.「オデは 決めたど！\n ナジーンのカタキを討ちに ゼクレスへ行ぐ！\n お前も:
I have decided! I'm going to Zechres to avenge
Najine's death! If you're Yushka's henchman,
you're coming with me!

246151.「えっへへー！\n おやびんが そー言うと思って\n 先に 偵察に 行ってきたよ:
Hehehe! I figured you'd say that, so I went
scouting first!

246152.「今 ゼクレスは エラいことになってるヨゥ。 \n あれだけ痛い目にあった バル:
Now Zechres is in trouble. Valdista's army,
which had suffered so much pain, has come in
to retaliate, and they're fighting like mad!

246153.「ほとんど 捨て身みたいな大攻勢に\n ゼクレス城は もちろん ベルヴァインの森:
The almost desperate offensive against Zechres
Castle and even the east side of Belvain
Forest is inaccessible...

246154.「ベルヴァインの森には 城から脱出するための\n 秘密の通路が あるらしいよー！:
There's a secret passage in Belvain Forest
that leads out of the castle! If we can use
it, maybe we can get into the castle?

246155.「オヨヨッ……！？ お前さん\n その抜け道を 通ったことあるのかヨゥ！\n ヨ:
Oyoyo...! You've been through that secret
passage? Yo yo yo, that's what I'm talking
about!

246156.「ガハハ！ よォォーーーっし 野郎ども！！ \n オデたちは ベルヴァインの森に:
Gahaha! Yoo-hoo, you bastards! I and my men
are in Belvain Forest, and we're going to draw
the soldiers to us.

246157.「お前は そのスキに ゼクレス城に入っで\n あのバケモノを ブッ倒しでごい。\:
You take this opportunity to go into Zechres
Castle and take out that monster. I'm counting
on you!

246158.「きっと 魔仙卿の 言う通りだわ……。 \n 東の方で 嫌な気配が 大きくなって:
Oracle must be right... a bad presence is
growing in the east.

246159.「ユシュカのことは 私に まかせて。\n 気をつけてね……。: Leave Yushka to me. Be careful...

246160.「ねえ ユシュカ。\n そのままでいいから 聞いて……。: Hey, Yushka. Keep it steady. Listen...

246161.「私 記憶がなくて 何も覚えてないけど……\n 自分が 何をしたいのか\n 何を:
I have no memory, I don't remember anything
but I know what I want and what I have to
do...

246162.「……あなたも そうでしょう？\n ナジーンと 一緒に見てきた 夢がある。\n:
...and so do you, don't you? I have a dream that Nazine and I have been working on together. There must be a role that only you
can play.

246163.「ユシュカ……。\n あなたは これから どうしたい……？: Yushka... what do you want to do now?

246164.ゲルヘナ幻野の 東にある関所から\nベルヴァインの森に入り ゼクレス城を目指そう:
Enter Belvain Forest Barrier from the barrier
east of Gerhena Field to reach Zechres Castle.

246165.「地下の侵入者とは お前か。\n 卑しい 宝石売りのしもべめ……。:
You are the intruder in the basement. You
lowly servant jewel-seller...

246166.「一度ならず 二度までも わらわに\n 歯向かったこと 後悔するがよいぞ！:
You will rue the day you stood against the
straw, not once, not even twice!

246167.「あ…姉上ぇっ！\n 城の正面も 突破されたようですぞ！:
Sister! It seems the front of the castle has
been breached!

246168.「エルガドーラぁ！ \n バルディスタを愚弄した その罪\n 貴様らの命で あが:
Elgadora! You have taunted Valdista, and your
lives will pay for it!

246169.「滅ぶのはお前のほうだ 野蛮なサルめ。 \n ゼクレス魔導国の 深淵なる叡智の結:
It is you who will perish, you barbaric monkey. You are the fruit of the profound wisdom of Zechres and you will only taste it
in your own body!

246170.「は…母上…………僕は……\n もう……やめ…………っ………………:
Mother... mother... i... don't... do...
this... thing... anymore...

246173.「う…うっそだろ おい…………。\n ヴァレリアが………………やられた？: No... no... no... Valeria... is down?

246175.「これで わかっただろう アスバル？ \n 母の言う通りにしていれば この世のす:
Now do you understand, Asbal? If you do what
my mother says, you can bring everything in
this world to its knees.

246176.「お前は人形！ 永遠に……わらわの人形！\n アッハハハハハ……！！:
You are a doll! Forever... my doll!
Hahahahahaha...!

246177.「そんな くされババアのざれ言などに\n 耳を貸すな アスバル。:
Don't listen to the ramblings of such a
stinking old hag, Asbal.

246178.「魔王たる者が 大魔王以外に\n ひざを屈するなど あってはならん。\n 俺が:
No one but the Great Demon King should bow the
knee. I will set you free!

246180.「ちぃっ……なんだ あの剣は！？\n どこまでも いまいましい男よ ユシュカ！:
What... what's with that sword? You're such a
damn man, Yushka!

246181.「わらわの魔力すべてを お前にゆだねよう！\n 殺せ！ ユシュカを……殺してしま:
I entrust you with all my magic! Kill
her! Kill Yushka!

246183.「俺たちの 選ぶ道が交わった その時\n 大きなチカラが 生まれる……。\n 魔:
When our paths cross, a great power will be
born, a power so tremendous that it will move
the Demon World.

246184.「……あいつは いつも 正論ばかりだ。\n 今なら どんな強敵にも 負ける気がし:
He's always right. I don't think I can lose to
any formidable foe right now.

246185.「さあ 俺たちが相手だ。\n かかってこい アスバル！！: Come on, we're the opponents. Come on, Asbal!

246187.「ゥォオ……オオオォォオオオオン…………。:
oooo... oooo... oooo... oooo... oooo...
oooo...

246191.「ここは こらえてくれ ユシュカ王！ \n ゼクレスの裏切りは すべて 姉上が…:
Hold on here, King Yushka! Zechres's treachery
was all your sister's...Elgadora's plot.

246192.「見てくれ アスバルの首輪を！\n エルガドーラは あれを介して\n アスバルの:
Look at Asbal's collar! Elgadora was
controlling Asbal's consciousness through that
thing the whole time.

246193.「だが エルガドーラは もう死んだ！！\n ミアラの宝杖も 壊されて\n もう二:
But Elgadora is dead! Miara's staff has been
destroyed, and the Fiend will never appear
again!

246194.「き…貴殿は……アスバルの 友人だったはずだ。\n だから どうか 許してくれえ:
You...you...were a friend of Asbal's. So
please forgive me...

246196.「ああ……許されるはずがない。 \n どうしようもない 俺の落ち度だ…………。:
Oh... it can't be forgiven. I can't help it.
It's my fault...

246197.「アスバルの異変に 気づけなかったのも！\n ナジーンが……死んだのも……！\n:
I couldn't see that something was wrong with
Asbal! And Nadine... died. It was all...
all... immature.

246198.「……ふたりとも 無事でよかった。: I'm glad you both are safe.

246199.「この女が しつこく つきまとってきたんだ。\n お前を助けに ゼクレスに行け…:
This woman has been pestering me. She wants me
to go to Zechres to rescue you.

246200.「魔界の三国 それぞれが 深手を負った。\n もはや 戦争など 続けられるはずも:
Each of the three nations of Demon World was
deeply wounded. The war can no longer
continue. I will rebuild Farazard...

246201.「お前は どうする？\n この魔界を どうしたいと思ってる？:
What about you? What do you want to do with
this Demon World?

246202.「かなうことなら…… \n お前が選ぶ この先の道が\n 俺が選ぶ道と 交わって:
If it were possible, I would hope that the
path you choose ahead intersects with the path
I choose.

246203.「少なくとも ナジーンは それを望んでた。\n ……そうだろ？:
At least that's what Nazine wanted. ...didn't
she?

246204.「今は お互いに 時間が必要だ。\n またな <cs_pchero>……。:
Right now we both need some time. See you
<cs_pchero>...

246205.「……心の痛みを 乗り越えた時\n 人は きっと 強くなれる。:
...When you overcome the pain in your heart,
you will surely become strong.

246206.「彼も 乗り越えられるわ。\n あなたが いろんな痛みを 乗り越えて\n 今 こ:
He'll get over it. Just like you overcame a
lot of pain and are standing here now.

246207.「さあ……魔仙卿の所へ 戻りましょう。 \n ずいぶん 長旅になってしまったから:
Now... let's go back to Oracle. It's been a
long journey and I just wanted to give you an
update on what we've been up to.

246210.「あ…あぁ…………。\n 僕は……なんてことを………………。: Oh... oh, my... oh, my... oh, my... oh, my...

246213.「これより 我ら バルディスタ軍は \n 砂漠を越え ファラザードを攻める。\n:
From now on, we, the army of Valdista, will
cross the desert and attack Farazard. No one
is allowed to approach!

246214.「即刻 ここから立ち去れ！\n さもなくば 容赦はしない……。:
Get out of here immediately! Or I will show
you no mercy...

246215.「この砂漠の果て ファラザードで \n 薄汚い盗っ人の王 ユシュカが\n 籠城を:
Here, at the edge of the desert, in Farazard
Castle, Yushka, the filthy king of thieves, is
holed up...

246216.「奴は 我が手から 魔瘴の巫女を奪い去った。 \n これは 我らへの 宣戦布告に:
He has taken the maiden of miasma from our
hands. This is nothing less than a declaration
of war against us.

246217.「真にチカラある者だけが 魔界を統べるに足る。 \n 魔界をたいらげ アストルテ:
Only the truly powerful can rule the Demon World. We will conquer Demon World and take Astoltia into our own hands. We, Valdista,
will survive the Age of Miasma!

246219.「いたいたーっ！ 探しちゃいましたよ～。\n ぼく 魔仙卿さまの使いで やってき:
Ouch! I've been looking for you! I'm here on
Oracle's errand!

246220.「ああ かわいそうな イルーシャさん！\n まさか さらわれてしまうなんて……。:
Oh, poor little Irusha! I can't believe they
took her.

246221.「すぐにでも 助けてあげてほしいですけど\n このまま 砂漠を進んだら\n 大き:
I wish I could help you right away, but if you
continue on through the desert, you'll find
yourself in a big fight...

246222.「そこで 魔仙卿さまは おっしゃいました。\n 少し遠回りですが 旧ネクロデア領:
Then, the Oracle said it's a bit of a detour,
but thinks we should find a way into Farazard
from Old Necrodea Area.

246223.「はるか昔 戦争で滅んだ ネクロデア王国……。 \n かの国の王族は 領土と砂:
Long ago, in the war-torn kingdom of Necrodea,
the royal family used a hidden trade route
between their lands and the desert.

246226.「ゲルヘナ幻野の南西に 旧ネクロデア領への\n 関所があります。その巻物を持って:
There is a barrier to the Old Necrodea Area southwest of Gerhena Field. If you bring the scroll, you will be able to break the seal of
the barrier.

246227.「それから……戦争にそなえて 魔界のあちこちで\n アビスゲートが 閉ざされてる:
Also...it seems that Abyss Gates are being
closed all over Demon World in preparation for
the war.

246228.「戦争が終われば また 開放されるはずですが\n それも いつのことになるやら…:
I'm sure it will be opened again when the war
is over, but I don't know when that will be...

246229.「では ぼくは これで……！\n イルーシャさんのこと よろしくお願いします！:
Well, I'll be going now. Please take care of
Ms. Irusha for me!

247710.バルディア山岳地帯の\nアビスゲートが 閉ざされたようだ。:
It appears that the Abyss Gate in Valdia
Mountain Region has been closed.

248130.「ユシュカ……<pc>が 来てくれたわ。 \n みんな あなたのことを 心配して:
Yushka...<pc> is here. Everyone is
worried about you. Please, open the door.

249309.「それならば なぜ……\n <pc>殿とは 協調できないのですか？:
If that's the case, then why can't you... work
with <pc>?

249314.<center>俺は 新しい国を作る。\nお前のチカラが 必要なんだ。: I will build a new country. I need your help.

251321.「どうか 旧ネクロデア領の 王都ネクロデア跡で\n 手がかりを 探してください！:
Please, please, look for clues in the Royal
City Necrodea Ruins in Old Necrodea Area! This
scroll should be able to help you.

251322.<pc>は モモモから\n幽冥の巻物（だいじなもの）を 受け取った！<me 60:
<pc> received
the Scroll of Dead (Key Item) from Sanguin!<me 60>
